verbose_text: Lei et al. found that miR-155 negatively regulates the EGF induced epithelial-mesenchymal transition (EMT), inhibits proliferation, metastasis, and invasion, and increases sensitivity to cisplatin [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Lei et al. found that miR-155 negatively regulates the EGF-induced epithelial-mesenchymal transition (EMT), inhibits proliferation, metastasis, and invasion, and increases sensitivity to cisplatin
